name: Balls! (itch)
description:
Welcome to Balls! The Multiplayer Mini-Golf Drafting Game!

Finally, Mini-Golf for the Modern era!

Each stroke, choose from 5 unique balls. Each one has it's own special rules, properties, and uses! Pick the right ball for the job, or deny someone their choice!

Compete against your friends in 12 fun-filled levels! Hop from island to island, navigate a desert of sand traps, or gravity-boost yourself from nearby black holes! 

Each level has multiple paths. Discover challenge holes with great rewards, or opt for a more conservative strategy.

Design, play, and share your own levels with the built-in Level Editor!!!

------------------------------------------

This game was made by me, with some help from my friends. I hope you enjoy! Please leave any comments or suggestions in the comment section below.
